captions.text:
♪♪ Sounds of Holiday Bells ♪♪
Male Voice: "Ahhh The Holiday Season a time

for celebration, magic and spending time with
the people you love. But don't forget who's
watching to make sure you're not being Naughty."

♪♪ Song Begins ♪♪
Lyrics:

"You better watch out,
You better not Skype,

You better log out,
Yeah you better not type,
The NSA is coming to town.

You're making a list,
They're checking it twice;

They're watching almost every electronic device,
The NSA is coming to town.

They see you when you are sleeping
They hear while you're awake

They know who you call and who you write
So encrypt for goodness' sake!

With Congress in the dark and a cloak-and-dagger
court

We're lookin' for answers, and they're comin'
up short
The NSA is coming to town.

They're making a list,
Checking it twice;

They're watching almost every electronic device,
the NSA is coming to town

The NSA is coming to town,
The NSA is coming to town."
Male Voice: "You wouldn't let government agents spy on your special holiday moments in person."
"Why are we letting them do it in the digital world?"
"Help us end the NSA's unlawful spying programs."
"Click Here And Take Action Now."

title: The NSA is Coming to Town

En tanke jag hade tidigare var att vi borde göra en reklamfilm som visar på 
hur vi blir övervakade. Alltså när du gör dina privata saker ska det stå 
någon som kollar över din axel. Av en slump så ramlade jag över detta klipp 
- och hade jag inte vetat bättre så skulle jag tro att någon bevakat min 
idé :-) - som visar på exakt den tanke jag hade, förutom att jag inte vill 
se någon tomte utan människor i svarta kostymer.

Det blir spännande att se människornas reaktioner - att IRL går de inte med 
på att bli övervakade men på nätet är det helt ok.

comments.author: aggel Norston

comments.text:
Senator Sanders,

Do NOT weaken National Security, instead provide broad knowledgeable 
Constitutional monitoring and development of NSA; Maximize Freedom and at 
the same time Maximize Security; not sacrificing one to have the other.

I require the National Security Agency (NSA) be managed and further 
developed by State representation guided by their State's Constitution, 
including ALL states, with diverse ethnic and cultural constituents, 
composed ONLY of state elected doctors of "philosophy, psychology, & 
sociology" (understanding broad human centered ethics) and science 
(understanding the technologies being monitored) and having no affiliation 
with judicial nor legislative branches of our State and Federal Government, 
to ensure the Security of all peoples Freedoms free of Corruption, and to 
determine how the information collected and derived by the NSA shall best 
be used as it relates to our Freedoms and Security, and to "absolutely" 
restrict this information from any other purpose.

We all make mistakes, and often out of ignorance or peer pressure. When 
corruption is detected and verified by the NSA, those related are notified 
of their transgression and given an opportunity to make restitution. Upon 
failing to provide restitution in a timely manner, the evidence is only 
then turned over to the District Attorney for processing.  The NSA never 
has direct control over any authority.

Each State would pay for their Representative's salaries.  This would be a 
small cost compared to the billions of dollars in corruption stopped and 
those resources used for "broad" taxed business developments.  Providing 
for National Economic Development.

Crowd-Funding provides all campaigning qualified doctors as NSA Ethics 
Representatives with equal access opportunity within each State.  Televised 
debate through public broadcasting, professional references, being free of 
any criminal record, and having no corporate affiliation, provides the 
Citizens of the United States with Ethical Representation of the numbers 
needed to monitor the large amount and technically complex information 
collected by the NSA.﻿

US government and CIA/NSA and other secret institutions are using sleep to 
brainwash and interrogate people. Lockheed Martin is responsible for 
researching this.
Key point is that they force a person to 'wake up' while he/she is not 
fully awake. This way they are able to question a person and even force to 
think a person - naturally by depriving his/her brain, causing damage to
the brain, and instigating headaches.
When a person is fully awake, he/she does not remember conversations he/she 
had.

What do you think?﻿

comments.text:
Fundstück der Woche: NSA-Skandal aus Sicht vom Weihnachtsmann
> The NSA is Coming to Town

Okay, Weihnachten ist jetzt doch schon etwas her. Trotzdem gefällt mir 
dieses Video immer noch richtig gut. "The NSA is Coming to Town"
ZITAT: ein paar NSA-Schnüffler im Santa-Kostüm auf ahnungslose Passanten 
los, die völlig ungeniert deren Daten sammeln. Der tiefere Sinn: "Sie 
würden sich im echten Leben auch nicht ausspionieren lassen, weshalb lassen 
Sie es sich dann in der digitalen Welt gefallen?"

QUELLE: chip.de﻿
